item.title: Why Not Both?
item.description: How best to start editor hopping? IntelliJ & Android Studio My first serious coding experience was in Android Studio for FIRST Tech Challenge. When I started taking CS classes in college, that led in to using the free IntelliJ Ultimate licences for students during my Java heavy coursework. Visual Studio I was required to use Visual Studio for several classes, as the C++ assignments were built around solution files. I found the expreience less than enjoyable, and stopped using it as soon as possible.
